course.subject: CHEM
course.name: Statistical Mechanics: Theory and Applications in Complex Systems
course.description: Classical statistical mechanics and its applications in complex chemical and biological systems.

reviews.author: holymama
reviews.title: CHEM course教Phy, 做嘅野係Maths
reviews.comment_content:
上一次開依個course已經係10年前........
Chapter 1.Introduction
Chapter 2.Basic statistical thermodynamics Ensembles, Boltzmann distribution, partition functions
Chapter 3.Simple systems Independent molecules, monoatomic gases, crystals
Chapter 4.Advanced topic I (onThermodynamics) Molecular Dynamics simulations and Conformational sampling
Chapter 5.Rate theories Regression theorem, Kramer theory, transition state theory, Langevin Eqn., fluctuation-dissipation, diffusion
Chapter 6.Classical statistical mechanics Classical partition functions, distribution function, simple liquid theory, Debye-Huckel theory
Chapter 7. Advanced topicII (on kinetics)

Ch.5-6 are covered by Dr. Cao Siqin
reviews.comment_teaching:
Prof. Huang is a nice prof with extremely in-depth teaching.
但係Dr. Cao真係有d唔掂，因為佢自己本身Physics出身，所以再加上本身course content好趕，所以好多野佢直接rush曬，好多人都一頭霧水。
但係final有好多題目都係佢出嘅:) 都好難好難，網上冇答案，要靠你平時有冇上堂抄足notes.

有興趣就睇下面個link 啦
http://www.nyu.edu/classes/tuckerman/stat.mech/lectures/downloads.html
reviews.comment_grading:
Take-home Final Exam: 80% (24 hr)
Other Performance: 20%

Final mean: 81.5/100, SD 8.418, lowest 52, highest 93 (89/100)

other performance唔洗理，基本上你上足堂就會俾滿分你
reviews.comment_workload:
我會話依個course嘅pre-requisite 唔單止係CHEM 2410, 仲有CHEM5230, PHYS 2124, PHYS3031同PHYS4052。首先，你數學底一定要好好，因為都幾多maths techniques, like ODEs, Fourier transform, special functions, 甚至有少量contour integral solve DE. 跟住，去到csq教嘅都有好多野喺phy嘅thermo course，或者係stellar astrophy有教。大家努力下啦:)

總結：CHEM course教Phy, 做嘅野係Maths
